resources.string: Find all about your attendance right here!
You are fairly regular you can skip some classes and have some fun
You dont need to change your habits, you will be fine.
You do need to attend some classes ,but dont worry it is easy to recover.
You really need to attend some classes , it might take time to recover.
You seem to be in some trouble. Dont even think of skipping class now!
We will tell you class to attended here
